Download the circle package in order to use the function rand_color() which 
randomized colors. 
```{r}
library(circlize)
```

The function make_art():
```{r}
make_art <- function(seed = NULL){
  if(!is.null(seed)){
    seed <- set.seed()
  }
  plot(1:10, axes = FALSE, ann = FALSE, type = "n")
  for(i in 1:10){
    segments(runif(1, min = 1, max = 10), runif(1, min = 1, max = 10), 
             runif(1, min = 1, max = 10), runif(1, min = 1, max = 10), 
             col = rand_color(1))
  }
  for(i in 1:10){
    lines(runif(10, min = 1, max = 10), col = rand_color(1))
  }
}
```

generating random art:
```{r}
make_art()
```

setting a seed in order to generate reproducible art:
```{r}
make_art(set.seed(1234))
```
